title: pEraruL purindiDuvAn
sahitya:
pEraruL purindiDuvAn Arumukha vaDivElan sIraDi tanadait-tEDi sErum aDiyAr uyya


anupallavi

  dhAraNiyOrin kurai tIrumAru parivODu pUraNamAna karuNai kUra sOrvilAdu


caraNam    annai parAshaktiyin anbu mighum AsiyODu annAL tanakkInda arputa vElai Endi
ponnirat-tOghai tigazh vaNNa mayil mEl vITru anbarin innalai aDiyODu aghaTriDavE
